HKWHub Specification¶

REST API Specification¶

Session Management¶

Start Session¶

  • API: GET /v1/init_session

  • Response
    • Returns a unique session id
    • The session id will be used for upcoming requests.
    • Example:




{“SessionID” : “1000”}
